website_summaries.verdict: Commercial quality in a pared-down design.
pros: Built for durability and cleaning power
Convenient features such as Hoover's "Wind Tunnel Technology" to lift away dirt
Dirt cup releases from the bottom, meaning you never have to get your hands dirty
Washable filter avoids costly and inconvenient replacements
cons: Users note that the battery doesn't last long

customer_reviews.title: This stick vac really really sucks (and that's great!)
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding suction, light-weight, a little pricey but you do get what you pay for. Oh, btw the suction is incredible for the size of this vac. Did I mention it sucks very well? It really really sucks really good...and battery recharging is a breeze. Highly recommended, even though it really sucks. ! But seriously, i think the 18 volts makes this vacuum an incredibly powerful, light-weight tool. I use it on vinyl AND carpets with great success. AND....I did tons of research - TONS, before settling on this one, and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is perfect! Perfect if you're looking for a toy vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect! Perfect if you're looking for a toy vacuum for a child. It makes a very nice "vacuum" sound, without acutally picking anything up, and little Jordan can happily "vacuum," while you follow behind and use a real vacuum cleaner! Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: RobertK

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite vac, I have all wood floors and a ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite vac, I have all wood floors and a couple area rugs I also have 2 dogs and 2 cats I use it several times a day 7 days a week. the biggest draw back is it tips over every easily and I've had several handles crack and one broke off. I tried a different brand it only lasted 6 mo.was holding a charge. So I decided I would try the hoover again and try the commercial works fantastic has more suction but still has tipping problem. Interested if anyone else is having this problem.
customer_reviews.author: lavonne schue

customer_reviews.title: so I just wasted money to buy this your almost $180 is good ...
customer_reviews.text: at first it was ok but after 1 month it could not vacuum the small particles it was running but could not get any dirt I try to return it but because it was past 1month it wasn't eligible for return . so I just wasted money to buy this your almost $180 is good only for 1 month ,I'm very much disappointed on this product. I hope I can get my money back..
customer_reviews.author: MILDRED MANALAD

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the regular model
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several of the Hoover cordless vacs over the last 10 years but this "commercial" one is best. You see I have 2 large dogs that shed so I need to clean every 2-3 days. I clean an area about 1500 sq ft and have always been fine on a single charge to get this done. In the past I spent around $150 for a Hoover Linx and was happy with it but now it is not made as well. This little vacuum is not meant to replace a full powered one but it does have enough suction to lift the carpet fiber properly.
customer_reviews.author: ZLC

customer_reviews.title: Light weight; performes better than our older pugin hoover upright.
customer_reviews.text: 10/01/2015 update: Product continues to perform above our expectations. Purchasing the second battery was the right decision. No regrets... Can't say enough about this vacuum... The reviews match the described performance and quality. Purchased an extra battery to extend the long term battery charge cycles (it's the engineer in me). Pulled invisible dirt and dog hair right out of the carpet. We are going to ditch our corded upright and focus on a good canister vac for jobs requiring a hose and attachments. We've decided that this would be a perfect combination for household cleaning. Our home has mixed hard surfaces, carpet, and throw rugs.
customer_reviews.author: J Hess

customer_reviews.title: I love that it stores easily w/o taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this vacuum. It has great suction power for it’s size. It’s lightweight, and easy to store. It’s also wonderful to use as a “quick pick up” on my carpet before guests come over, and works super great over my tiles. I never sweep my floors at all anymore! However, the extra battery that I ordered with it was defunct after two months so I sent it back and was promised a replacement battery.... which never came. 🤬 That was two years ago. But I do love the vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Clark

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one to replace my older one. Good battery life but you may want to purchase an extra battery and charger. Four stars because my older unit developed problems with the rotating brushes and required warranty replacement of the entire unit. Replacement was slow and the same problem returned again after warranty ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Replaceable Rechargeable Batteries
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite stick vacuum for a while now. I like that I can get spare batteries. I like that it sucks up everything I want. Debris container is easy to dump and clean. I can easily switch between wood floors and carpet. It does have one problem that is annoying and that is the debris container can be bumped off if it hits something. That design bothers me enough I could drop it to a 3 stars but it doesn't happen often. Replaceable batteries more than make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is listed as commercial. It's FAR from Commercial.
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as commercial. It's FAR from Commercial. I work in a warehouse office and this vacuum hasn't done well. The filter gets clogged easily. When this happens the dirt/rocks/etc. falls out of the bottom. I feel like this would work well in a home, but it is just awful for commercial use. I wish I hadn't purchased for my office. It's a real headache.
customer_reviews.author: Tflo

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: Won't pull a sick dust bunny off a polished mahogany floor.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. You will spend more time cleaning this vacuum than actually using it. It stops up with just a hair or two and then you will need to take it apart and clean the debris from the air chute. It's useless otherwise. Save yourself the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Carl S Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: NOT built for commercial use!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's titled a "commercial" brand product so you know it's going to be used everyday and should be built to do so. It worked great for the 1st couple days then continually got clogged. We only use it for the entry way of my gym and after about 3 weeks we got tired of unclogging it every night and now it just sits, torn apart from making sure every single airway is debris- free, in my office. NOT built for commercial use!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meloni

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is pretty heavy Works good on hardwood floors but not on ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty heavy Works good on hardwood floors but not on certain rugs would I buy it again noI would not
customer_reviews.author: Lena Stull

customer_reviews.title: best vacuum for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home because of experience with the one that I use at work. The one I use at work has lasted 3.5 years and sucked up ungodly things that we are grateful to not have to reach down to touch with our hands. The charge lasts a full week even using several times every day. 3.5 years later and it keeps running strong!
customer_reviews.author: krander

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner. It is compact, easy to maneuver and carry. It is portable and does not use an electrical cord. This is my second one since I have one upstairs and downstairs for easy access. It has two speeds and it is very efficient. I bring it out every time I need it without hauling a heavy clunky vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Bonbon

customer_reviews.title: Love My Light Weight Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little light weight vacuum. I's very easy to move around and I like not having to get tangled up in a cord. The battery pack charged right up. This vac is so much easier to use than my corded vac I just might be able to keep my house cleaner. It is so convienient, I enjoy not having to lug the "big old monster" out. Definitely recommend...watch for a sale!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Tener

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I didn't buy one sooner. It is the perfect vacuum to zip around the carpets in between those heavy cleanings because it's so light weight and there's no cord you have to worry with tripping over. However, I have actually started using only this one and the big $600 one is in the closet, resting comfortably!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and handy vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum cleaner to replace a cordless Dirt Devil model that I had been using for a couple of years. The Dirt Devil model did well, but was starting to lose its effectiveness. The Hoover model is much more powerful, and does a good job on both carpeted and bare floors. The battery pack is easy to recharge and holds a charge for a long time. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Goodell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: IT BROKE AFTER 6 MONTH! BASICALLY STARTED SPITTING OUT JUNK I HAD VACUUMED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUnk
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this it will not charge and never has worked well. I do not write reviews because most of the time I am 100 % satisfied . This vacuum is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bartlow

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Saw it being used in a restaurant, tried it, love it. Just right for light dining room tasks. Wife loves it. Good battery life and suction.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the quick clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly impressed with first uses. Works very well on both carpet and bare floors. Very light and maneuverable. Excellent for the quick clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Z

customer_reviews.title: the best cordless vacuum to me
customer_reviews.text: thried them all. this is the best to me: vacuum great, battery last, easy to use. One down fall: plug easily at the entrance of the sucking. Check it regularly. But they all do that anyway...
customer_reviews.author: elisabeth vazquez

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: It is such a great addition to my home. It amazes me and my husband how powerful this vacuum is.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Consider Hoover (over Dyson)
customer_reviews.text: For the money-- best deal for cordless vacuum. It really picks up a lot. Dyson is three times the price but is not three times better. My daughter has a Dyson cordless. Best deal I have made lately.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hasenfuss

customer_reviews.title: A Vaccum that Actually Sucks Up the DIRT!!
customer_reviews.text: Great vaccum!!! It's so light weight and it does a great job of sucking up the dirt!! I have shag area rugs and it finds everything hiding in there. Even the dog's bone!!!! Love this sweeper. The battery lasts as well and I have 1400 square feet of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H

customer_reviews.title: and I absolutely love it! Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out after a friend had purchased. Received mine a couple of weeks ago, and I absolutely love it! Very light weight, great suction and excellent maneuverability. Easy to clean debris cup, and works wonderfully picking up the dog hair of my pup. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Great vaccum.
customer_reviews.text: I like the vaccum cleaner, I use it in our office we are a hair tranplant clinc, so we SEE hair, so far have not had problems with the battery running down as others have mentioned but had it to stop once because of too much hair in it, cleaned it out been running fine every since..
customer_reviews.author: twintoo

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum for quick convieniant cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice solid little vacuum! We're wanting to have some small rechargeable vacuums that can be use in-between church services in the sanctuary. We bought just one to see how it would workout, and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkcat

customer_reviews.title: Clogs too easy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly the worst vacuum I've used. Doesn't suck up anything. If it gets one little piece of paper it's clogged. Doesnt pick up the small baby rock, just stays in the brush making cracking noises. Battery is horrible, lucky if it lasts 20 min...I had read it supposedly lasted 60 min; not even close Had high expectations considering the price...I was wrong. Gonna re-order the $109 cordless vacuum I had before. It's fine for a small household though. Only pick up very small sand and dust. Can't pick up any small papers.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Avila

customer_reviews.title: We own (2) of them!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Hoover cordless vac we have purchased. My hubby wanted one in his shop, so I got the new one! So easy to use. No cord to have to bother with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: Pre-Clean For This Machine
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is currently being is used in a commercial restaurant setting, and has been for several weeks. So far the durability and ease of cleaning the machine is good. It does run pretty loudly though, which makes it a distraction for people currently dining around the area that needs to be cleaned up. It does hold its charge rather well, and effectively picks up most small crumbs and debris. If you need to clean up after a table of child diners, do plan on spending some time on your hands and knees pre-cleaning before taking this vacuum in to complete the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tri-Dent Raider

customer_reviews.title: The Battery quit charging months after I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Hoover has given me a horrible run around... I have been trying to get this fixed since I bought it two years ago. After two years with cancer, I have decided to conquer this as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Buysse

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that the battery is up front on the canister so easily remove it and store the vacuum remotely from the charger.
customer_reviews.author: John H Koch

customer_reviews.title: the best vacuum for the money at its weight
customer_reviews.text: Use it fir intermediate vacuuming in the house. Good on all surfaces, pet hair, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the battery charges in its own charger. The vacuum works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: PA Leo

customer_reviews.title: battery has very little life when fully charged
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this unit approximately 6 times and although I keep the battery fully charged it does not hold long enough to do about 500 sq feet of tile flooring. thinking about returning
customer_reviews.author: bdlaudun

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderful while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful while it worked. 1 month after the warranty ran out the on/off switch broke. Can't purchase replacement parts without taking it to a dealer. Spoke with Hoover customer service and received the typical cookie cutter answer which is take it to a dealer and pay to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hillberry

customer_reviews.title: Great for fast jobs!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for small fast jobs. Battery doesn't last long and tank feels up fast!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: BEST CORDLESS VAC I'VE OWNED
customer_reviews.text: Powerful for being cordless. Couldn't live without it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ORLANDO RAY

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My Hoover task is almost 2 years old and it still working great! I really like This vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: theresa ronayne

customer_reviews.title: this vacuum works well and I like that they use a battery
customer_reviews.text: this vacuum works well and I like that they use a battery. They are easily moved around because of their lite weight and no electrical cord to mess with
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: this is a great light weight vacuum it fully charged in 2 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great light weight vacuum it fully charged in 2 hours and I have used it every day for 3 days and still going strong. luv it, (picks up dog hair)
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not have good suction - the small Lynx is better
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for 4 months now, I've used it maybe 4 times and it wont even turn on. I've tried everything, charging the battery for 24hrs, taking it apart and cleaning it etc. Dont waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ketay

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. I really like that it is super lightweight. The battery is easy to charge, I wish I had bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Earles

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vac for the price
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has performed superbly. Make sure you order extra sponge filters so you always have clean ones available. I even purchased extra batteries because I clean large areas. Great cordless vac for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We use this instead of our regular sized vacuum on hardwood floors and large area rugs/carpet. The vacuum power os that good on it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: My wife and daughter love it. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter love it. Lightweight, long run time, lays down to get under beds. Easy to charge and clean. Bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Small easy to use vacuum for small areas when you don't want to use the large vacuum. Runs on a battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sally B.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, it! Easy to empty trash container. Lightweight and easy to use. Usually prefer a bagged vac, as I feel less dirt is emptied into air. Not a concern with my new vac.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daily dog hair vacuuming. Light weight and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cordless vacuum, runs great and lasts a long time on one battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum came with a missing filter cap. But, when I called Hoover customer service telling them, they immediately sent me a replacement. Good customer service and so far, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Magery Hutson

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: lightweight , handy, and easy to use. It could use a little more suction, I sometimes have to make several passes to get it to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: yes yes yes buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 4 of these for gifts and my use amazing machine...love it. powerful, easy highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lawnae hunter

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not long enough always having to charge the battery. Suddenly place vacuum upright it always falls to the ground. No other problems at this time.
customer_reviews.author: case

customer_reviews.title: Light easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Happy with vacuum even though charge lasts barely long enough to vacuum upstairs. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Knoblock

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Lightweight vacumn works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great Small Vacumn Love it so far so good. Hoover always a Great Product Sandy
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, light weight, battery operated vacuum. It does a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Judith John

customer_reviews.title: Really Light and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum and very light. Purchased this for my secretary and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.  Klep

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Convenient!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best cordless vac I have ever owned. Great for everyday pickups, but powerful enough that you could use it as your main vac. Runs about 30 minutes per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tga16

customer_reviews.title: Had NiCd and they go bad quickly. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Lithium ion battery ia absolutely the way to go. Had NiCd and they go bad quickly. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Seward

customer_reviews.title: It's a good one!
customer_reviews.text: So light weight and easy to push. A friend had recommended it to me and I was skeptical at first due to battery power. But it had enough to get the job done and then some.
customer_reviews.author: weefrog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. Great price. I'd like an extra battery. Is one available for purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Great for vacuum between major vacuuming with electric . Easy to maintain and clean.Very light.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ingoglia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product I may end up ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Hoover Commercial is excellent. It has power
customer_reviews.text: The Hoover Commercial is excellent. It has power, picks up everything , small, light. Charges quickly. It is a great product for people like me with all wood and tile downstairs and 2 dogs and a cat. On top of that I am OCD about a clean house so this little taskvac picks up all the hair from the animals. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Williams

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vacuum! It is great for carpet or tile
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vacuum! It is great for carpet or tile. Easy to clean, long battery life and quick charge time.
customer_reviews.author: mcragun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plastic instead of metal that holds the roller brush in place.
customer_reviews.author: david h madden

customer_reviews.title: This vac is light weight, powerful, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This vac is light weight, powerful, and the battery life between charges is more than I expected. My home is evenly divided between hard surface and carpeted floors, and this vac is made to order for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: BILL C.

customer_reviews.title: Product no long works after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but it stopped working purchased in June 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient! It is light, a lot of power for a battery operated vacuum, and easy to use. I would buy one for all my friends, if the price wasn't so high, but worth the spend. Only other competition is the Dyson,but that is over $500!!! On sale.
customer_reviews.author: ATX32801

customer_reviews.title: We love it but need an extra dock and battery
customer_reviews.text: We love it but need an extra dock and battery. Can anyone tell me where to buy the battery dock?
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rosignoli

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, battery doesn’t last long :(
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last long at all for a commercial vacuum. Suction not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It works great, is light weight & so convenient to use. Does a great job on carpeted stairs. Did get an extra battery for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cordless I have had. Very happy with it on carpet and hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D. Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Not for commercial use but great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Not a commercial vac. I bought it originally for work in the janitorial field I had to take appart the vac to remove hair and debris stuck on the beater brush bar. So I took it home to use around the house and its perfect for that great on both hardwood and tile floors and carpets perfect for stairs. I would recommend buying an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: David Singer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so light. I have two
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Roelfs

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This item should have a 10 star rating. It has been the best small appliance I have purchased for the home. Very lightweight, easy to manuver from carpet to hard flooring. NO CORDS!!!! Take it anywhere in the house. It is awesome in the kitchen and baths to reach under the cabinets at the toe kick. Power (suction) is GREAT! I recommend this item to everyone. Thank you Hoover.....
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very light weight and does a great job on laminate floors as well as carpet!!
customer_reviews.author: mark fazzino

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for size and price
customer_reviews.text: Works well. If there's a lot of dog hair on the carpet I need to do 2-3 runs over to get it all, but that has to be expected for a vacuum of this size and price, right? I mean there are vacuums that market themselves for dog hair removal that are 100s of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is just perfect for what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Janet McHugh

customer_reviews.title: It only work for a little over a mont.
customer_reviews.text: It only work for over a month. It doesn't suck dirt as described. Called the number shown in the vacuum unit for customer service and reached their call center and was advised they don't replace and because it was over a month from date of purchased return not allowed. So very expensive for just a little over a month of use. Sucks!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hoover however I have to empty it after ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hoover however I have to empty it after each use & make sure all the bristles on the bottom are free and clear of any debris that may have been picked up. The battery life is adequate for cleaning and lasts about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Davies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom. She has 2 long hair dogs, and a lot of foot traffic. I used it at her house and was amazed with the ease of use and the suction. It does need to be emptied several times to vacuum a large room, but so much easier to use than my heavy corded upright and old Electrolux canister vac. I will be ordering one for myself. A real back saver.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: so far so good but, as with every vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my restaurant a few months ago. so far so good but, as with every vacuum, we are constantly taking it apart to clean and dig out/ cut out hair. wish it was a little more quiet...as we use it during business hours. very light weight, easy to assemble. we previously had a 350 dollar dyson and I don't see much of a difference besides the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However this one isn't as good as the $99
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Commercial Hoover Lithium Ion vac, when it came the motor made an awful noise. So I mailed it back & they sent a new one. However this one isn't as good as the $99.00 Lithium Ion stick vac that I already had. The ONLY thing better about this Commercial vac is the fact that it has rubber on the tires so it is quieter!! It does NOT such any better at all, in fact it is worse!! I HATE it!! Wish I could contact Hoover to tell them what I think of their Commercial Stick vac. I love the $99.00 Hoover Stick Vac with Lithium Battery!!! love--Love---LOVE that one. Save your money--buy the cheaper one. It's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Philips

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 months old and stopped working. This is the second on I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: BENEDETTO R.

customer_reviews.title: Goood
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Pay a littlr more for the commerical than the residential its a world of a difference. Our residential version lasted us about 1.5 yrs of almost everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: good little vac, but
customer_reviews.text: To clean a whole house you need a second battery, especially if you run the brush. Other than that, does do a good job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Bug man

customer_reviews.title: ... this vacuum total of 4 months and it worked beautifully for the first90 days
customer_reviews.text: Have used this vacuum total of 4 months and it worked beautifully for the first90 days. Now it will barely pick up anything. Battery is not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: mkg

customer_reviews.title: Great portable vacumn
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this vacumn! My cleaning woman liked it so much she purchased for her mother. Very light weight and easy to use. Battery holds a charge decent amount of time too. Amazed at all this picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Sonneborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my tiny house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my tiny house. Cordless, battery charged quickly, easy to access. Dirt canister is sized proportionately. Swivel head maneauvers really well. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one died within a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst vacuum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst vacuum I've ever used. When turning off the beater brush, there is absolutely ZERO suction. Returning this immediately. What a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for while...  Then not so much
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum for about a year, light and effective, my 8 yr. old uses it daily - then it just fizzled on me and doesn't pick up like it used to. Sadly I just got off the phone with Hoover and I am 1 month past warranty. How did they know it would only last a year? Maybe for the price a year is good enough?
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Mama

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is light and easy to use. Perfect for our quick clean ups during the day. I would recommend to anyone looking for a powerful, lightweight vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: desert aids

customer_reviews.title: Had a bit of a challenge at first but love the results for a daily cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of a challenge at first but love the results for a daily cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
